title: Planning & Vision
description: Define your renovation goals, establish budget, and create initial concepts. This crucial first stage sets the foundation for your entire project.
activities: Research professionals and get initial quotes

title: Design & Documentation
description: Work with architects and designers to create detailed plans, select materials, and finalize the design before construction begins.

title: Consents & Approvals
description: Obtain necessary building consents, resource consents, and other approvals required before construction can begin.
activities: Apply for resource consent if required

title: Pre-Construction
description: Final preparations before construction begins, including contractor selection, scheduling, and site preparation.
activities: Set up site facilities and safety

title: Construction Phase
description: The main construction work including demolition, structural work, and installation of new elements according to the approved plans.

title: Finishing & Handover
description: Final inspections, finishing touches, and project completion including handover of all documentation and warranties.
